data.text: @schiavonihockey Thanks

@Kravitz76 Sore arm and tired after first shot day after, sore arm, low grade fever, chills, headache, just generally out of it after second shot day after. First day for both slightly sore arm, third day for both, fine.
@MattyNats_ @Gretchen415 @Kravitz76 This, exactly this.
@farawayliz Thanks, those are the most common symptoms I've heard about so if that's it no problem.
@Kravitz76 i had a headach with first dose the 2 dose  i had a slight fever and muscle aches all and felt sickish as well but it only lasts for a day. i'm happy i got both dose of maderna!
@Kravitz76 Hope you made it through without too much difficulty
@Robostop10 Yeah that's what I've heard
@Kravitz76 One other thing nurse told me those symptoms are your body building up the immunity system
@Robostop10 Thanks
@Kravitz76 Just had my moderna thursday. Thursday was fine but Friday low grade fever, slight headache. Today back to normal
@T0MMYB0Y_ @MWharam7 @Kravitz76 I never felt that tired. I felt like I ran a marathon in the rain
@Nelford @MWharam7 @Kravitz76 Shit my girl been sleeping since 9pm last night after getting it yesterday 😂😂
@midnightwonko Thanks
@Kravitz76 I was one of the lucky ones.  Sore arm both times.  Second time, I experienced potentially unrelated drowsiness.  Nothing else.
@alex27n_ thanks

@Kravitz76 1st shot: nothing but a sore arm
2nd shot: sore arm, then about 12 hours after the shot was fever, headache, fatigue, body ache, and hot/cold flashes. That all lasted about a day.
@claire_altman16 Thanks
@JDysland Good to hear
@donharc Thanks
@mikeweglian Thanks
@Nelford Thanks, I'm hearing a wide range of effects so hoping for the best.
@Michele96691414 Thanks!
@snazzzyredhead Thanks
@BrianSaysWhat Thanks
@jeanne_blue Thanks, that 2nd part is really interesting given I assumed older people would have worse effects.
@SCuralli Thanks, yeah I'd gladly take a sore arm if that's the extent of the effects.
@Kravitz76 None

@Kravitz76 Got my 1st Moderna shot on Sat 04/17, sore shoulder for 2 days. That’s all. I have heard the 2nd shot is more severe. My bosses husband was down for 3 days with flu like symptoms. Get my 2nd shot on 05/15. Can’t wait!!!
@Washing71413557 @Kravitz76 Fever one night, back ache, mild cough and was tired for like 10 days. Had worse cases of the flu.
@Washing71413557 @Kravitz76 Same
@Kravitz76 Reading comments it literally sounds like you get covid with 2nd shot. Fatigue, fever, and headache.
@Kravitz76 I had moderna earlier this week - only some soreness in the arm - no other side effects that I noticed
@MWharam7 @Kravitz76 I slept the whole day. I couldn’t keep my eyes open
@Kravitz76 1st shot had no issues. 2nd shot I had flu symptoms from 8am to about 7-8pm. They just vanish like I never took the shot

@Gretchen415 @Kravitz76 1st shot #Moderna = Sore Shoulder about one day.

2nd shot = from appx. +6 hours to +32 hours, #Flu like symptoms and feeling awful. Chills, Skin sensitive, exhausted, joint aches. 

48 hours later, back to normal.

Good luck.
@Kravitz76 Just a sore arm for me and a little sleepiness that afternoon. Armwas sore for like 2 days. That's it, second dose,  same
@Kravitz76 Stronger fluid shot first does second dose dehydration and tired

@Kravitz76 First shot: sore arm, very fatigued the next day. I got my second shot on Thursday - sore arm, headache, fever, chills, fatigue. Slept most of yesterday and other than a sore arm, feel fine today!
@Kravitz76 1st shot, nothing; 2nd shot, arm hurt all day the next day, then nothing
@Kravitz76 DON’T take any other OTC pain meds (pharmacist’s instruction). No Advil, no Aleve.

@Kravitz76 1st shot: A lil arm pain, but that was it for me.
2nd shot:
- Drink lots of water 
- Start taking Tylenol 4 hours after (1 in 3 get the “robust immune response”. As of this tweet, I’m 18 hours post-2nd shot & (knock on wood) nothing yet, having done the above))
@Kravitz76 Nun

@Kravitz76 One of my neighbors got Moderna. He said he didn’t have any side effects and felt fine. I think everyone reacts differently maybe?I had my first shot of Pfizer and have to wait for my second since you have to wait so many days. My arm was sore for a few days and I got a bruise😬
@WPitch Thanks
@Kravitz76 Zero for both.
@JWallMVP Thanks!
@Kravitz76 I got Pfizer, first dose just a little fatigued but I haven’t got my second dose yet. Wishing you the best my guy!
@VeggieTart Thanks
@NattiPatti Thanks, yeah I've heard a wide range of effects so I'll hope for the best.
@Kravitz76 I had Moderna, nondominant arm, I had a bit of soreness in my arm and was tired for a couple of days, but nothing serious.
@Kravitz76 None with first, restless night with second but it varies with age...
@Kravitz76 At 2pm you shall develop gills
@redskin_potato Thanks
@Kravitz76 Got my shot around 2 pm, a little tired that night, more tired and slight headache most of the next day.
@bryankgreenberg Thanks, yeah I'm hearing a wide range of things and slightly more serious effects after the 2nd.

@Kravitz76 1st shot little discomfort in arm. 2nd shot knocked me out 12-36 hrs. Took off work day after 2nd shot. After was fine. Some friends did get temperature and chills. But felt great 37 hrs after. Best wishes on Mon and welcome to #TeamFunkyColdModerna
@itssselizeahhh Thanks, I have some Advil as well for pain
@Kravitz76 As long as you don’t take it before you get the vaccine! All my docs + nurses I’ve seen said to take Tylenol so it helps with the pain + whatever side effects!
@itssselizeahhh Just had someone tell me a nurse told him not to take Tylenol to let his body naturally work through the response to the vaccine, but I have some on hand if I need it.
@Kravitz76 Thanks amd to you ..
@lpsrocks Thanks and best of luck with the 2nd
@Kravitz76 Hell yeah good luck brother

@Kravitz76 Moderna first shot .. sore arm for about 3-4 days ..
I get 2nd shot Tuesday .. check back in for updates next week
@nahlikcj Thanks, I'd definitely take that if that's it.
@ADH6626 Definitely!
@Kravitz76 First shot - just a sore arm for a day. Second shot - less of a sore arm and just a little fatigue the next day for half the day or so.
@Kravitz76 make sure to take Tylenol!!

@Kravitz76 First shot I had nothing besides bad arm pain but second shot my arm was hurting a little less which was good. I did have some side effects the next day, a slight temperature, headache, and loss of appetite but it went away the next day. I pretty much slept the entire second day
@Kravitz76 Flu-like symptoms are easy peasy compared to a ventilator. You got this!
@Kravitz76 @CarrieSweet2017 Recommended by nurse to not take Tylenol the first few days so your body can work thru it naturally.
@RallyPoncho Thanks
@Kravitz76 @joe719 Whatever side effects people get they mostly seem to be short-lived.   #Moderna
@Kravitz76 Nothing on the first shot. Stretch your arm a lot so it doesn’t hurt next day. Second shot, very mild cold-like symptoms for two days. Easy.
@joe719 @Rigel9000 Thanks

@Rigel9000 @Kravitz76 After the 2nd shot, I got up in the middle of the night with a fever, took 2 Tylenol...woke up a few hours later soaking wet...fever was gone and I felt fine. That was the only reaction I had.
@maryann1126 Thanks and agreed on that

@Kravitz76 The pharmacist told me to drink plenty of water and tylenol if I had any fever or symptoms afterwards.  I was just a little off and carried on with my normal day. Wishing you no side effects, but side effects are still better than the virus.
@zknit Thanks

@Kravitz76 First shot no issues. 2nd shot overall fatigue started about 9hrs after plus brief chills and joint aches and a bit of a headache. Slept. Drank lots of water. All normal 36 hrs after shot. Totally worth it.
@OsRavensCaps Thanks

@Kravitz76 The next day I went up and went to work but by 530 I was exhausted out of nowhere. Fatigue lingers a few days. I did end up with “Covid arm” from moderna. It went away in about a week.  Just stay hydrated before it helps with symptoms.  Good luck!

@Kravitz76 Slight arm pain after the first.  After the 2nd about 19 hours after I had a pounding headache.  Slight body aches and chills. Headache was the worst and the fatigue. Fever of 102. Gone in about 12 hours after symptoms start. Drink TONS of water the day before and day of shot.
@RBNicholsJr Thanks
@TjBlowshie Thanks

@Kravitz76 I finally broke down and got Pfizer a week ago.  Only a sore arm for a day.  

I’ve been told to drink lots of water before and after your second shot.
@FedTimeBrian That's what I'm hearing, side effects from 2nd are a bit worse.
@robinhartcarrol Good advice thanks
@robinhartcarrol Thanks
@Kravitz76 you as well
@TjBlowshie Yeah I'm hearing a wide range of things after each, best of luck to you.
@Kravitz76 It’s the second shot that knocked my wife on her butt.
@Kravitz76 And I had it done in my dominant arm so I’d use it more as some have suggested, to keep the  blood flowing :)
@pmacewan Thanks
@lynne_fenwick Thanks Lynne
@Kravitz76 Just a sore arm, then a pretty big knot but no soreness, then a red patch. All over 8 days but no icky feeling.
@Kravitz76 i am now thank you, just hoping it isn’t as bad when i get the second dose
@PippiNatTalking Sure thing!
@stevendwoodruff Great 👍
@maryann1126 I'd take that if that's it
@gracew5668 Thanks
@TjBlowshie Yikes, hope you're better at this point.
@ADH6626 Thanks

@Kravitz76 Jeff. Some malaise and feeling tired. No fever. 48 hours after the vaccine developed a lump with rash at injection site. Had the shot on Wednesday and felt really good by Sat, but side effects did not stop me.
@Kravitz76 Rash like a sunburn for about a week 2nd shot. Didn’t hurt went away after about 5 days. Lazy Saturday required day after shot two.
@Kravitz76 Thank you for getting your shot!!
@Kravitz76 None for either.
@c4man5282 Thanks
@Kravitz76 starting at midnight the day i got it, then a full 2 days after... i felt like absolute holy ass... i had the virus a week before getting the shot tho so that might’ve played a part in it

@Kravitz76 2nd shot 4/21. Me: slight injection site soreness if I put pressure on it- #1 & 2. Husband had a 30-minute episode of flushing and dizziness about 12 hours after the first, mild headache managed with Tylenol day after #2. Son had fever, chills, and headache day after, esp.  #2.
@Kravitz76 #1  a bit of a sore arm #2 a little off for a whole day
@j_cooper2_ Thanks
@Kravitz76 Slight pain in arm; 2nd shot, a little fatigue, sad & sluggish. Really mild. I take Lysine daily to boost my immune system, which probably helped. Back to normal after 2 days.

@Kravitz76 Nothing after 1st for wife and I. 2nd shot my wife was sick with flu like symptoms for two days and I felt like I had a hangover with cold chills for the day after, but I was still able to go to work.

@Kravitz76 First Moderna shot just gave me a sore arm and I felt a little sluggish. Second Moderna shot hit much harder. I felt perfectly fine for the first 12 hours after the shot. Then had flu like symptoms (especially chills) for the next 24 hours. Then I instantly snapped back to life.
@Kravitz76 Same experience for my husband and several friends so best of luck!
@Brandy1024 Yeah I'm hearing several more effects with the 2nd.
@Kravitz76 I only had a little soreness at the injection site
@Ireneish12 Thanks
@Kravitz76 Welcome. I think i was reverse of most who had more issues with the second lol
@Brandy1024 Thanks
@FranklinsRule Good to hear thanks
@Johnson_DavidW Thanks
@Gretchen415 Thanks
@nissenson Thanks
@anniedineen Thanks, I'd take that outcome
@amaiznblugrl Thanks
@Kravitz76 None.  Believe for the same and maybe you will not have any too.
@Kravitz76 First shot: pain around shot area, fever and fatigue. Second shot: nothing
@Sec314Tom Thanks
@AllenCaps1995 Cool, thanks.
@Kravitz76 Slight arm soreness after shot one for a couple of days. Moderate arm soreness after shot shot two for a couple of days. That’s it!

@Kravitz76 first shot, not just sore but painful arm. I'm told that moving your arm regularly for the first hour or so post-jab will diminish that pain. Second shot: 8 hours post, brain fog; day later; aches, pain, fever, exhaustion, fog. Lasted 3 days.
@sad_ex_machina Thanks
@EmGeeEm804 Thanks, yeah I'm hearing a wide range of things so far.

@Kravitz76 Minor headache after 1.

Bigger headache immediately after 2 lasting 2 days. Exhausted, slight fever overnight (vax was at 9:30am so started at about 11pm), chills, exhaustion next day. All good day 3
@Kravitz76 First shot nothing. Second a teeny-tiny bit achy. One Tylenol took care of it.
@lizzardkingg I'll do that, thanks.

@Kravitz76 Arm soreness with both. I had no other side effects except 8 days after my first shot I got a small rash at the injection site that lasted 12 hours. I was told that was normal and if I wanted to get the 2nd shot in other arm to be cautious (I did). No rash on 2nd

@Kravitz76 First shot: nothing but a lump on my arm. Second shot: chills and headache started about 12 hours after. slept for 36 hours. Fine after that. Big lump on my arm. I’ll take it to avoid Covid.
@Kravitz76 Mild headache after 1.  Really achy and hungover field for 24 hours, beginning about 12 hours after shot 2. Woke up the next morning feeling fine!
@Kravitz76 I got my first shot yesterday, and my arm was very sore this morning, like to the point of restricting movement. But that was it, no fever or anything.
@DeliaMacD1 Good advice, thanks.
@Kravitz76 Arm hurt for a week after the first one, nothing else. Was exhausted for 24 hours after the second, arm hurt for 3 days. That’s it. Fully vaxxed since February
@Kravitz76 They weren’t *too* bad, and they were cleared up by about 30 hours after the shots. Side effects were actually worse with my first shot
@CarrieSweet2017 @Kravitz76 Same here
@Kravitz76 Rub your arm and use it so that blood circulation is good! I had a slight headache that day. Yay for vaccines!
@CarrieSweet2017 Thanks
@MWharam7 Thanks, if fatigue is the worst part of it I'll take that.
@Kravitz76 Evening of shot, hands hurt and I was tired. Next day lethargic. Following morning was cleaning the house like a banshee, was 💯
@spongy_mcdiver Thanks
@Kravitz76 First shot , nothing. Second shot, started to feel feverish about 24 hours later, ached all over. Took Tylenol and went to bed. Felt fine next morning.
@PippiNatTalking Thanks
@Kravitz76 First was tiring  but I drank that night. 2nd just super sore and tired. Good after day 2.
@DC4Hope Good to hear. 👍
@inVEZtigator_ Yikes, hopefully that's a rare thing.
@Kravitz76 Woohooos!! I got my first moderna too. Zero side effects. 💙💙💙
@Kravitz76 I was fine for the first few hours then it hit me like a freight train. Had a fever and really, really tired. Like I had gone 2 days without sleep
@Kravitz76 I’ve got the 1st one and didn’t get no side effects
